meanings.definition: Not able to be disputed or questioned.
meanings.sent1: The fact that the sun rises every morning is unchallengeable.
meanings.sent2: Her skills in mathematics are unchallengeable.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin flying is as unchallengeable as a fish climbing a tree.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work is unchallengeable, like a mountain standing firm against the wind.
meanings.sent5: The unchallengeable truth of gravity keeps us grounded on Earth.

meanings.definition: Not able to be challenged or contested.
meanings.sent1: The champion's title was unchallengeable after his flawless victory.
meanings.sent2: The rules of the game were unchallengeable and had to be followed by all players.
meanings.sent3: The cat's claim to the entire house was unchallengeable, much to the dismay of the dog.
meanings.sent4: Her authority in the matter was unchallengeable, like a queen's decree.
meanings.sent5: The unchallengeable fortress stood strong against any enemy attack.
